item.description:
This is a change of venue - we will meet at 10pm near the bar when you first walk in. My picture is on here so you can identify a familiar face.

Note that this is a Saturday night - I am flexible about timing and venues for future events, so please send me your ideas.

Be sure to RSVP and feel free to invite others. Thanks and see you there!

For more information, see http://www.sanctuaryb...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Sanctuary, this Saturday, Oct. 15, 10pm
